title: Japan / NA servers ( please help )
body: I am currently in the US Navy, stationed in Japan. I would like to get the optimal experience / fps by playing on Japanese servers, but i obviously cant read Japanese, is there any way i can play on the Japanese servers in English? Please answer ASAP, thank you very much.

replies.body:
You can change your in-game language on the login screen under your password. You're a biiiiiit our of luck in this instance though, since the Japan region only has Japanese as an option. 

Every region has its own set of languages which you can check on our [Language Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).
*Generic plea for VO's and text languages for all regions*
